modName: Blade of Riven the Exile - League of Legends
summary: The sword wielded by Riven the Exile (League of Legends). Contains the ability to briefly transform the broken blade into its full majestic glory.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center][b]=Description=[/b][/center][/size]
My first mod I\'ve ever made. This is my attempt to replicate Riven\'s sword (from League of Legends) in Skyrim to the best of my ability.

I am not much of a script writer, but have at least managed to come up with a spell to do what I want.

You are given a spell (Blade of the Exile) that you can hold in your character\'s left hand. If you hold The Exile Blade (Broken) in your right hand, it will switch to The Exile Blade [True Form] that will consistently drain magicka while it is equipped. Once magicka is depleted, it will switch back to the regular. You will not be able to activate the spell with less than 50% magicka, this is to simulate a require cooldown.

P.S. I get the irony of using what is essentially mana for Riven\'s sword, considering how that champion is played in her game.

[youtube]8OCbmH3j7AQ[/youtube]


[size=3][center][b]=Change Log=[/b][/center][/size]
[center]Ver. 1.02[/center]
- Fixed a glitch causing an extra Exile Blade (Broken) from entering one\'s inventory after using the ultimate. 

[center]Ver. 1.01[/center]
- Changed the Blade of the Exile spell so it cannot be used when the Exile Blade [True Form] is being used 
- Changed magicka drain value to drain at 5% of base magicka, as opposed to 5 magicka per tick 

[center]Ver. 1.0[/center]
- Released



[size=3][center][b]=Installation=[/b][/center][/size]
Use either Nexus Mod Manager or manually extract from Winrar or WinZip to \"Skyrim\\Data\" folder.



[size=3][center][b]=In-Game=[/b][/center][/size]
In order to get the weapon and spell in game without the console, both can be crafted at a Blacksmith Forge.

=Steel=
The Exile Blade (Broken)
Requires: Steel Sword (1), Origin of the Exile (1) // Perk: Armsman (1)

=Misc=
Origin of the Exile
Requires: Ruined Book (1) // Perk: Armsman (1)


[size=3][center][b]=Known Issues=[/b][/center][/size]
- The True Exile\'s Blade can technically be dropped. If this is done, then one can easily dupe the sword. When the True Exile\'s Blade is picked up it no longer causes magicka drain.

- While you are capable of enhancing the sword at a grindstone, at present there it is kind of a waste. Due to the way the script works when \"transforming\" the weapon (literally I\'m item swapping), it upon return to the broken blade, it will no longer be improved.

Bethesda - For creating Skyrim of course!
